text: Makadii? Paronda renyu parikubuda ropa, kuzvimba, hurwa, kurwadziwa, kutsvuka, kana kuvhurika here? Bayai 1= Hongu 0=Kwete, motumira

Ke letsatsi la bo 7.  A o itemogela go tswa madi, go ruruga, boladu, botlhoko, boshibidu, go bulega ga ntho kgotsa matshwao a mangwe? Tsenya
1=Ee
0=Nnyaa

Tlosa bandeiji. A o itemogela go tswa madi, go ruruga, boladu, botlhoko, boshibidu, go bulega ga ntho kgotsa matshwao a mangwe? Tsenya
1=Ee
0=Nnyaa
Re lebogela go tsaya-karolo gago mo patlisisong e. Re kopa oboele kokliniking kamoso godira ketelo yago e khutshwane ya letsatsi la bo14 lego amogela airtime

Gare ise re utlwe gotswa go wena beke e. A otswa madi, wa ruruga, boladu, botlhoko, boshibidu, o bulega ntho kgotsa matshwao a mangwe? Tsenya
1=Ee
0=Nnyaa

Ke matshwao a feng?
Go tswa madi 
Go ruruga 
Boladu 
Botlhoko 
Boshibidu 
Go bulega ga ntho 
Matshwao a mangwe?

Usuku lwesi khombisa. Unjani? Ngabe ube nakho ukopha, ukuvuvuka, ubomvu, ubuhlungu nokuvuleka kwesilonda? Faka
1 = Yebo
0 = Cha

Khipha ibhandeshi.
Ngabe ube nakho ukopha, ukuvuvuka, ubomvu, ubuhlungu nokuvuleka kwesilonda? Faka
1 = Yebo
0 = Cha
Siyabonga ukuba yinqenye yesifundo. Sicela ubuye emtholampilo ngosuku lesi 14 uzohlolwa uthole ne airtime

Unjani? Ngabe ube nakho ukopha, ukuvuvuka, ubomvu, ubuhlungu nokuvuleka kwesilonda? Faka
1 = Yebo
0 = Cha
Asikezwa kuwe kuleli Sonto. Ngabe kukhona ukopha, ukuvuvukala, ubomvu, ubuhlungu, ukubomvu bensilonda, ukuvuleka kwesilonda noma okunye? Faka 1 = Yebo; 0 = Cha

Yikuphi obe nakho kulokhu?
1. Ukopha
2. Ukuvuvuka
3. Ubomvu
4. Ubuhlungu
5. Ububomvu besilonda
6. Ukuvuleka kwesilonda
7. Okunye nje

actions.text: Thank you for participating in the study. Please return to the clinic tomorrow for your short Day 14 visit and to receive your airtime.

It is Day 7. Are you experiencing any bleeding, swelling, pus, pain, redness, wound opening, or other? Enter
1=Yes
0=No 
and press send.
We have not heard from you this week. Are you experiencing any bleeding, swelling, pus, pain, redness, wound opening or other? Enter 1=Yes; 0=No and press send.

Please remove the bandage. Are you experiencing any bleeding, swelling, pus, pain, redness, wound opening, or other? Enter:
1=Yes 
0=No 
and press send.

How are you? Are you experiencing any bleeding, swelling, pus, pain, redness, or wound opening? Enter:
1 = Yes
0 = No
and press send.

message.eng: Hi @contact.first_name, thank you for participating in the study! Today is Day 14. Please attend your appointment today for review and to receive airtime.
message.tsn: Dumela @contact.first_name, relebogela gotsaya karolo gago mo patlisisong! Gompieno ke letsatsi la bo14. Dira ketelo yago gompieno gore o tlhatlhobiwe o amogele airtime.
message.zul: Sawubona @contact.first_name, siyabonga ukuba yingxenye yesifundo! Namhlanje lusuku lwesi 14. Sicela ufike emtholampilo uzohlolwa uthole ne airtime.
